item.description:
New England Alfresco users!

It's been quite some time since we have gotten together.  Alfresco has released version 4!  Alfresco 4 is a milestone release. 

John Newton, CTO of Alfresco, said, “Alfresco 4 is the result of a collaboration with our 2,200+ enterprise customers and 250+ global SI partners to create the most robust and extensible platform for a new generation of cloud-scale content apps. We have dramatic improvements in Alfresco’s ability to scale and perform, while making it easier for developers to customise and extend the platform.”

Join us on the 12th of April for a User Group Meeting, Drinks and Community

We'll be covering:

  • Alfresco 4
  • WCM Solutions on for Alfresco 4
  • NE User Group House Keeping

Spread the word and see you there!

group.name: New England Alfresco Content Management User Group

item.name: Alfresco Meetup
